attributes.action: stop getting through to call centers when you phone the police
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if you dont like getting through to call centers when you phone the police

especially on islands beacuse when you phone the police (not 999) you get through to some call center in glasgow who dont know anyting about anywhere in your local area

ex. theres a fire at st andrews primary school and then send the police to st andrews church
